                <w:ind w:left="2160" w:hanging="720"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>a)</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:tab/>
                <w:t>Submit to the IRB a written notification of the emergency use of a test article in a life-threatening situation.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="16B6F4A3" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
                <w:ind w:left="2160" w:hanging="720"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>b)</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:tab/>
                <w:t>Include a copy of the signed consent document used (or provide certification by the treating physician and an uninvolved physician that the criteria for the exception from informed consent were met).</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="03D3DF38" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
                <w:ind w:left="720" w:firstLine="720"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>c)</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:tab/>
                <w:t>Include your assessment of the outcome.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="72271E30" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
                <w:ind w:left="720" w:firstLine="720"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>d)</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:tab/>
                <w:t>Include a statement that this is a final report, if the treatment is complete.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="61BE1624" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
                <w:ind w:left="2160" w:hanging="720"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>e)</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:tab/>
                <w:t>If the follow up is in progress or the treatment is not complete, indicate when you expect to send a closeout report to the IRB.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="546442E9" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Resources for Emergency Use of Investigational Test Articles are available on the IRB website, including:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2567CAB3" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="3"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> “SOP: All Emergency Use and Compassionate Use Review (HRP-023)”</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="19D7F7A4" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="3"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>“WORKSHEET: Emergency Use (HRP-322)</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="0D44146A" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="3"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>“Emergency Use Consent Template (HRP-506)”</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="07CFE514" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>These instructions apply to the “on label” Single Patient Emergency Use of an HUD (that has an approved HDE) before its use is approved at the University of Minnesota by the UMN IRB. You must notify the IRB within 5 business days via email and include this information:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="4D93D714" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="2"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>PI Name and contact information</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3BAEF78D" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="2"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">State the name of the sponsor: industry or PI (sponsor-investigator) </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="425BBB88" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="2"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Date of the use</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="54362C0B" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="2"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Link to the FDA HDE approval page</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3D448175" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="2"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Patient history describing the medical need</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="082728B8" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="2"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Alternatives and urgency discussion necessitating the use prior to the IRB approval</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="6151CBB2" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="2"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Whether or not you intend to get this HUD approved at the UMN</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1A0055FD" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="2"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Statement that you shared the HUD approved pamphlet with the patient, or that they were not in a condition to receive that information.  Please note that ICF is not usually required for HUD use.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="19EF9B16" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="181D5C1C" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041038" w:id="113"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What if I need to request approval for a planned exception to my protocol?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="113"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="39634BBB" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>A protocol exception is a one time, intentional action or process that departs from the IRB approved study protocol for one participant. Protocol exceptions must be approved by the IRB prior to implementation of the exception. A departure from the protocol that is submitted to the IRB after the action or process has occurred is considered Non-Compliance that must be reported to the IRB as new information.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="315D0932" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>To submit an exception request, investigators must submit a Modification in ETHOS (or a Change in Protocol Request if the study for which the request is being made has not yet been migrated to ETHOS) since such a request is considered a modification to previously approved research. The following information must be submitted with the Modification (or Change in Protocol Request) for an exception:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="593688D9" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="10"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Documented approval from the study sponsor, medical monitor and other oversight entities (e.g. FDA for studies under an IND or IDE held by a University sponsor) as applicable;</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1C2CC3D4" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="10"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>A description of the requested exception including references to the approved protocol, proposed date, rationale, clarification as to why the change/action is one time and any plans for communicating the exception to the participant;</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7C614B11" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="10"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Assessment of increased risk involved in the exception;</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3B89CE13" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="10"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Assessment of participant benefit from the exception;</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="30B39555" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="10"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Revised consent form, if applicable;</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="74749CF7" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="10"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Assessment of exception impact on data integrity – including a statement about whether or not the data collected as a result of the exception will be analyzed in a different manner from other collected data; and</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="38B6ADB0" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="10"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Declaration of time sensitivity and applicable rationale.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5331F973" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Factors that may influence IRB review of an exception include submission of a revised consent or addendum to the consent form and/or plans to modify the protocol.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3F3B99AD" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The IRB will, within IRB standard operating procedures, accommodate exception requests as quickly as possible. Exceptions will be reviewed by non-committee review or by a convened IRB depending on the nature of the request. Generally, the IRB will review the modification via non-committee review when a modification meets the following criteria:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="6C836713" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="50"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Does not affect the design of the research,</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="08162CF5" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="50"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Does not add more than minimal risk to participants, and</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="55C75997" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="50"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Falls into one of the federal expedited review categories.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5BC4E499" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>When immediate action must be taken to eliminate an apparent, unexpected hazard to the research participant, the PI may act without prior IRB approval. In these cases, the PI must report the situation to the IRB within 5 business days by submitting a Report of New Information.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="2B82AD41" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="4F3D7120" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041039" w:id="114"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What if I’m using human embryos or human embryonic stem cells?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="114"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="0329C2A7" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="070707"/>
                </w:rPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">You must follow University policies for the use of human embryo or human embryonic stem cells in research, including </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId102">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Conducting Research with Human Embryos or Embryonic Stem Cells</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="070707"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="741D34F7" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>To the extent an embryonic research study requires review and approval by the IRB, review will be conducted by the full convened IRB.  The IRB will consider limiting the scope of the study to a small number of subjects in the earliest stages of this research and will assign frequent reporting and continuing review intervals for this research.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1F85DFB2" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The IRB will coordinate its review of this research with the Research Compliance Office (RCO) and other institutional offices, including communications entities.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="6DE372B9" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The IRB, through the Executive Director of the HRPP, will officially notify the Institutional Official that this research has been proposed and is under review.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="49B512DA" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="42A1018C" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041040" w:id="115"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What if I’m using human fetal tissue in transplantation?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="115"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="35C53539" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="070707"/>
                </w:rPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">You must follow all federal, state and University policies, laws, and regulations concerning the use of human fetal tissue in transplantation, including </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId103">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Procuring and Using Human Fetal Tissue for Transplantation Research</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="070707"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="69978B9E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">When an application for approval is submitted, the IRB will follow all requirements related to donation of tissue, designation of recipient, and all specific requirements for informed consent of all parties. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="75D42A46" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Review of this research is to be conducted by the full convened IRB. The IRB will consider limiting the scope of the study to a small number of subjects in the earliest stages of this research.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="6766C5A0" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The IRB will assign frequent reporting and continuing review intervals for this research.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="6CB87140" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The IRB, through the Executive Director of the HRPP, will officially notify the Institutional Official that this research has been proposed and is under review.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="7ADD9431" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="218B0407" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041041" w:id="116"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What if I’m using human fetal tissue in NON-transplantation research?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="116"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="6D264D7E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">You must follow Minnesota law (Minnesota Statute 137.47) and all University policies for the use of human fetal tissue in research, including </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId104">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Acquisition, Use, and Disposition of Donated Human Fetal Tissue for research (Non-Transplantation) or Teaching</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00B12638" w14:paraId="7177C984" w14:textId="77777777"/>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1B7AB8C7" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">Application to the IRB is not required unless you interact with, or receive identifiable information about the donor of the tissue. The IRB has a limited role in reviewing fetal tissue research after it has been reviewed and approved by the Fetal Tissue Research Committee, as described under Policy, </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId105">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Minnesota Laws Affecting Human Research (HRP-112)</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="4E0F6C74" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041042" w:id="117"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What if I’m doing research with potentially hazardous biological agents?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="117"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="40C086E4" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Potentially hazardous biological agents may include but are not limited to human gene transfer, the deliberate transfer of recombinant DNA or RNA, infectious agents, including non-virulent and vaccine strains and/or biologically derived toxins, including mutated, truncated, or inactivated toxins.  Research that involves human subjects and potentially hazardous biological agents must be reviewed by both the IRB and the IBC.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3503B01F" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>For experiments involving the deliberate transfer of recombinant DNA (rDNA), or DNA or RNA derived from rDNA, or synthetic nucleic acid molecules into human research participants (human gene transfer (HGT)), no research participant shall be enrolled until the:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="69886030" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="22"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Recombinant DNA Advisory Committee (RAC) review process has been completed (if applicable);</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2FDF03DB" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="22"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>IBC approval (from the clinical trial site) has been obtained;</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="19A3AA0C" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="22"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>IRB approval has been obtained; and</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="36BF5EC2" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="22"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>All applicable regulatory authorization(s) have been obtained (1-A-1-a).</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="66A30E7E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">In addition to </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:i/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>NIH Guidance</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> and review, all HGT clinical trials are subject to FDA regulations as biological products.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="186FE5B2" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">The consent form for human subjects must meet </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:i/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>NIH Guidelines</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> as well as the requirements of 45CFR46.116 and 21CFR50.25 for informed consent. The IRB and IBC will collaborate to revise the consent form(s) to ensure that risks and benefits are clearly described.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="17CBA30D" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">Researchers may submit applications simultaneously to the IRB and IBC. HRPP staff may triage and pre review the applications. But, according to the </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:i/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>NIH Guidelines</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">, the application must first be reviewed by the IBC in order to inform the IRB in its review of the application. The IBC advises the IRB on risk assessment and biosafety issues according to the </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:i/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>NIH Guidelines</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7A3AE4D6" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Review the “WORKSHEET: Ancillary Review Requirements (HRP-309)” to understand the process for ancillary review.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="4069F202" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3B7611C4" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041043" w:id="118"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What if I’m doing international research?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="118"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3B945A47" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Your protocol must include a description of the international or local immigrant research location and describe the levels of protection appropriate for the location (i.e., appropriate access, consent options, etc.).  The University of MN IRB prefers that in international research there be a local IRB or other review committee that oversees the research in addition to the University of Minnesota in order to help ensure that the research is culturally acceptable.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="455839F9" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Review the “</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId106">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="1155CC"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>WORKSHEET: International Research (HRP-336)</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>” for further guidance on developing an international research protocol.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="64B4D9AD" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">The convened IRB or designated reviewer may review and/or consult with University, local or national experts to determine if the research is appropriate based on the laws and knowledge of the country or community in which the research will take place and may consult the OHRP website publication, </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId107">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:i/>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>The International Compilation of Human Research Protections</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>, for in-country research information.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="090FA1FC" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>During IRB review, researchers are informed of University policies on travel approval and registration with the UMN Global Programs and Strategy Alliance through the International Travel Risk Assessment and Advisory Committee (ITRAAC).  Student-investigators and faculty leading students must get approval through ITRAAC before final IRB approval will be granted.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="37C5F5BF" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="407178E1" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:rFonts w:ascii="Arial" w:hAnsi="Arial" w:eastAsia="Arial" w:cs="Arial"/>
                    <w:b/>
                    <w:color w:val="070707"/>
                    <w:sz w:val="32"/>
                    <w:szCs w:val="32"/>
                </w:rPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:br w:type="page"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5C371712" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading1"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041044" w:id="119"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>IRB Review of Human Research</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="119"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="487CE461" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041045" w:id="120"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What are the different regulatory classifications that research activities may fall under?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="120"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7A524B14" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Submitted activities may fall under one of the following four regulatory classifications:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="42174968" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="58"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Not “Human Research”:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> Activities must meet the university definition of “Human Research” to fall under IRB oversight. Activities that do not meet this definition of  are not subject to IRB oversight or review. Review the IRB Office’s “WORKSHEET: Human Research (HRP-310)” for reference. Contact the IRB Office in cases where it is unclear whether an activity is Human Research.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="12680076" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="58"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Exempt:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> Certain categories of Human Research may be exempt from regulation but require IRB review. It is the responsibility of the university, not the investigator, to determine whether Human Research is exempt from IRB review. Review the IRB Office’s “WORKSHEET: Exemption (HRP-312)” for reference on the categories of research that may be exempt.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3AE67500" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="58"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Review Using the Expedited Procedure:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> Certain categories of non-exempt Human Research may qualify for review using the expedited procedure, meaning that the project may be approved by a single designated IRB reviewer, rather than the convened board. Review the IRB Administration’s “WORKSHEET: Eligibility for Review Using the Expedited Procedure (HRP-313)” for reference on the categories of research that may be reviewed using the expedited procedure.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="36235B70" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="58"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Review by the Convened IRB:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> Non-Exempt Human Research that does not qualify for review using the expedited procedure must be reviewed by the convened IRB.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="0577BABF" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5D43E9CE" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041046" w:id="121"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What are the decisions the IRB can make when reviewing proposed research?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="121"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="116D7B6D" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The IRB may approve research, require modifications to the research to secure approval, table research, or disapprove research:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3024B42E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="42"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Approval:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> Made when all criteria for approval are met. See “How does the IRB decide whether to approve Human Research?” below.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="0B21094D" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="42"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Modifications Required to Secure Approval:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> Made when IRB members require specific modifications to the research before approval can be finalized.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="0D6E987B" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="42"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Tabled:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> Made when the IRB cannot approve the research at a meeting for reasons unrelated to the research, such as loss of quorum. When taking this action, the IRB automatically schedules the research for review at the next meeting.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="66DC616D" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="42"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Deferred:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> Made when the IRB determines that the board is unable to approve research and the IRB suggests modifications the might make the research approvable. When making this motion, the IRB describes its reasons for this decision, describes modifications that might make the research approvable, and gives the investigator an opportunity to respond to the IRB in person or in writing.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2F927C06" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="42"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Disapproval:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> Made when the IRB determines that it is unable to approve research and the IRB cannot describe modifications the might make the research approvable. When making this motion, the IRB describes its reasons for this decision and gives the investigator an opportunity to respond to the IRB in person or in writing.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="21ACBB76" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7AA06A11" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041047" w:id="122"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>How does the IRB decide whether to approve Human Research?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="122"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="771203F6" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">The criteria for IRB approval can be found in the “WORKSHEET: Exemption (HRP-312)” for exempt Human Research and the “WORKSHEET: Criteria for Approval (HRP-314)” for non-exempt Human Research. The latter worksheet references other checklists that might be relevant. All checklists and worksheets can be found in the </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId108">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>HRPP Toolkit Library</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> on the IRB Website.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="092EE2E4" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>These checklists are used for initial review, continuing review, and review of modifications to previously approved Human Research.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="66C2F54E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>You are encouraged to use the Checklists to write your Investigator Protocol in a way that addresses the criteria for approval.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="60499F2E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="036C8C7E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041048" w:id="123"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>May I attend the IRB meeting at which my submission is reviewed?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="123"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00B12638" w14:paraId="76567D03" w14:textId="77777777"/>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="6F06C19D" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">PIs or Co-investigators may make themselves available to participate by phone.  Direct communication between the committee and the researcher can be tremendously helpful but isn’t always necessary.  To respect everyone’s time, we will only contact you if there is information needed during the meeting that could substantially enhance the committee's understanding or have material effect on the review outcome.  </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00B12638" w14:paraId="713EA908" w14:textId="77777777"/>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="0BE781A2" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">The IRB will contact you via ETHOS when your submission is assigned for full committee review.  The communication will include the date and time of the meeting.  Meetings typically last two hours. If you or a co-investigator listed on the study will be available  to respond to questions or concerns you may indicate that via a comment on the study in ETHOS or by emailing the analyst assigned to the study.  Please provide the name and phone number of the individual the committee should contact.  </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00B12638" w14:paraId="4B64E2B7" w14:textId="77777777"/>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="785A6F87" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">Please note that review decisions will not be shared during the call.  The study team will be notified of the review outcome in writing after the meeting.  </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="40758135" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="76EAAF22" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041049" w:id="124"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What will happen after IRB review?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="124"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="244DA63C" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The IRB will provide you with a written decision indicating that the IRB has approved the Human Research, requires modifications to secure approval, or has disapproved the Human Research.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="51EF2170" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="38"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>If the IRB has approved the Human Research:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> The Human Research may commence once all other university approvals have been met. IRB approval is usually good for a limited period of time which is noted in the approval letter.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5DE2B721" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="38"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>If the IRB requires modifications to secure approval and you accept the modifications:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> Make the requested modifications and submit them to the IRB. If all requested modifications are made, the IRB will issue a final approval. Research cannot commence until this final approval is received. If you do not accept the modifications, write up your response and submit it to the IRB.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5D9846FA" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="38"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>If the IRB defers the Human Research:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> The IRB will provide a statement of the reasons for deferral and suggestions to make the study approvable, and give you an opportunity to respond in writing. In most cases if the IRB’s reasons for the deferral are addressed in a response to the deferral, the Human Research can be approved.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="35E7C46E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="38"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>If the IRB disapproves the Human Research:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> The IRB will provide a statement of the reasons for disapproval and give you an opportunity to respond in ETHOS.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="1767811C" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="78D0DE25" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041050" w:id="125"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What if I disagree with the IRB’s decision?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="125"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7FE71C83" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">Researchers may request that the IRB reconsider a decision by submitting a written response to the IRB in ETHOS within 5 business days. When submitting a request to reconsider, the researcher must provide rationale for the request, including any additional supporting documents. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="603DBD28" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Grounds for a request are limited to:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3B8E9334" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="16"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>New information not reasonably available during the IRB review/investigation</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="67B20C67" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="16"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Material failure by the IRB to follow IRB policies and procedures</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3492B571" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="16"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">The sanction exceeds the severity of the non-compliance violations, if applicable </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7B478AB6" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="16"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The action is disproportionate to the risks to subjects safety/welfare</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="02A16015" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> Documents can be included in the Supporting Documents section of the ETHOS SmartForm.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="03EFB1C4" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>These considerations also apply to all other submissions, including Modifications, Continuing Reviews, Reports of New Information, and also where the IRB has suspended or terminated the Human Research.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="1D835F29" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="53E65FC8" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041051" w:id="126"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What are my obligations after receiving a Not Human Research or Exempt determination?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="126"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="47F55994" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">If you have received a “Not Human Research” or “Exempt” determination, you are still subject to other University obligations and requirements. Any significant changes to your proposed activity must be submitted to the IRB prior to initiating the changes. In some circumstances, the significant changes may lead to a different determination. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2A7A63B9" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">The IRB does not require changes in personnel to be submitted for studies that have received a “Not Human Research” determination. For studies that have received an “Exempt” determination, changes in personnel must be submitted for review.  </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="34508BB2" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="110BFD30" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041052" w:id="127"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What are my obligations after IRB approval?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="127"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="13FCE5E5" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Do not start Human Research activities until you have the final IRB approval letter.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="680C324B" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Do not start Human Research activities until you have obtained all other required institutional approvals, including approvals of departments or divisions that require approval prior to commencing research that involves their resources (see HRP-309 Ancillary Reviews)</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="36F2589D" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Ensure that there are continued adequate resources to carry out the research safely. This includes, but is not limited to, sufficient investigator time, appropriately qualified research team members, equipment, and space.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="0A3E520F" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Ensure that Research Staff are qualified (e.g., including but not limited to appropriate training, education, expertise, credentials, protocol requirements and, when relevant, privileges) to perform procedures and duties assigned to them during the study.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="13DEC6D2" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Personally conduct or supervise the Human Research. Recognize that the investigator is accountable for the failures of any study team member.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="647E10B2" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Conduct the Human Research in accordance with the relevant current protocol as approved by the IRB, and in accordance with applicable federal regulations and local laws.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="53537586" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>When required by the IRB ensure that consent or permission is obtained in accordance with the relevant current protocol as approved by the IRB.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="43D06EFF" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Do not modify the Human Research without prior IRB review and approval unless necessary to eliminate apparent immediate hazards to subjects.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2E3EF3E5" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Protect the rights, safety, and welfare of subjects involved in the research.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="401F6811" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Submit to the IRB:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="0FE81FC8" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Proposed modifications as described in this manual. (See “How do I submit a modification?”)</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5717F9B2" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>A continuing review application as requested in the approval letter. (See “How do I submit continuing review?”</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="4DD30ACA" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>A continuing review application when the Human Research is closed. (See “How Do I Close Out a Study?”)</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3451BB27" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Complete the Reportable New Information (RNI) SmartForm in ETHOS and submit within 5 business days for any required reporting (see HRP 024 New Information and HRP-321 Review of Information Items).</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3E85A3DB" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Submit an updated disclosure of financial interests within thirty days of discovering or acquiring (e.g., through purchase, marriage, or inheritance) a new financial interest.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="27EBD67C" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Do not accept or provide payments to professionals in exchange for referrals of potential subjects (“finder’s fees.”)</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1D90294B" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Do not accept payments designed to accelerate recruitment that were tied to the rate or timing of enrollment (“bonus payments.”)</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3E8CD858" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="4"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>See additional requirements of various federal agencies in Appendix A. These represent additional requirements and do no override the baseline requirements of this section.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="3C54875A" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
