        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="11D96A4E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041053" w:id="128"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>How do I document consent?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="128"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5CCFE74F" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Use the signature block approved by the IRB. Complete all items in the signature block, including dates and applicable checklists.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2EE9ABA6" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The following are the requirements for long form consent documents:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="556AD300" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="46"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The subject or representative signs and dates the consent document.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7E2D7CB7" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="46"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The individual obtaining consent signs and dates the consent document.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="321670E4" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="46"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Whenever the IRB or the sponsor require a witness to the oral presentation, the witness signs and dates the consent document.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="21F5B0C6" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="46"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>For subjects who cannot read, and whenever required by the IRB or the sponsor, a witness to the oral presentation signs and dates the consent document.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="698B5C84" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="46"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>A copy of the signed and dated consent document is to be provided to the subject.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="226923D3" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The following are the requirements for short form consent documents:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="36901066" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="46"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The subject or representative signs and dates the short form consent document.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="4FD1DC1D" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="46"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The individual obtaining consent signs and dates the summary.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="40F6342E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="46"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The witness to the oral presentation signs and dates the short form consent document and the summary.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="403C94EA" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="46"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Copies of the signed and dated consent document and summary are provided to the person(s) signing those documents.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="6F29A46E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
                <w:ind w:left="720" w:hanging="360"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2B95FE7B" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041054" w:id="129"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>How do I submit a modification?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="129"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="34508B87" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">Complete the Modification form in ETHOS and attach all requested supplements, have the PI submit the form by clicking the “Submit” activity. Please note that research must continue to be conducted without inclusion of the modification until IRB approval is received. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="11058187" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1B46D676" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041055" w:id="130"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>How will the modification be reviewed?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="130"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="079E2C1C" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:after="160"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">OHRP </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId109">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0563C1"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>states</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> that any change that materially affects the risk/benefit assessment should not be considered minor.  The following are examples of the types of changes or circumstances that may require non-committee or committee review or require a new IRB application before it can be reviewed by the IRB.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:tbl>
            <w:tblPr>
                <w:tblStyle w:val="a1"/>
                <w:tblW w:w="9457" w:type="dxa"/>
                <w:tblBorders>
                    <w:top w:val="single" w:color="000000" w:sz="4" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:left w:val="single" w:color="000000" w:sz="4" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:bottom w:val="single" w:color="000000" w:sz="4" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:right w:val="single" w:color="000000" w:sz="4" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:insideH w:val="single" w:color="000000" w:sz="4" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:insideV w:val="single" w:color="000000" w:sz="4" w:space="0"/>
                </w:tblBorders>
                <w:tblLayout w:type="fixed"/>
                <w:tblLook w:firstRow="0" w:lastRow="0" w:firstColumn="0" w:lastColumn="0" w:noHBand="0" w:noVBand="1" w:val="0400"/>
            </w:tblPr>
            <w:tblGrid>
                <w:gridCol w:w="2685"/>
                <w:gridCol w:w="2985"/>
                <w:gridCol w:w="3787"/>
            </w:tblGrid>
            <w:tr w:rsidR="00B12638" w14:paraId="7F143378" w14:textId="77777777">
                <w:trPr>
                    <w:trHeight w:val="420"/>
                </w:trPr>
                <w:tc>
                    <w:tcPr>
                        <w:tcW w:w="2685" w:type="dxa"/>
                        <w:shd w:val="clear" w:color="auto" w:fill="7A0019"/>
                    </w:tcPr>
                    <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5A0EED56" w14:textId="77777777">
                        <w:pPr>
                            <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
                            <w:jc w:val="center"/>

                                <w:rFonts w:ascii="Times New Roman" w:hAnsi="Times New Roman" w:eastAsia="Times New Roman" w:cs="Times New Roman"/>
                            </w:rPr>
                            <w:t>Every business and industry protocol submitted to the IRB MUST be submitted under an IRB application just for that protocol. It is not permissible to submit different protocols under a single IRB application. Changes to business and industry protocols must be clearly marked as a modification to the protocol, under an existing IRB study.</w:t>
                        </w:r>
                    </w:p>
                </w:tc>
            </w:tr>
        </w:tbl>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="0A2EC587" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3F5C8B82" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041056" w:id="131"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>When do I submit a modification versus reportable new information?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="131"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5C60CE4B" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="160" w:after="160"/>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="202020"/>
                </w:rPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="202020"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>There has been some confusion about when to submit a report versus when to submit a modification.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="08D70BCF" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="160" w:after="160"/>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="202020"/>
                </w:rPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:b/>
                    <w:color w:val="202020"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Modifications</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="202020"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>: In general, whenever you are planning to make changes, submitting a modification is the appropriate choice.  This can include changes to recruitment or consent procedures or materials, survey instruments, and changes in personnel.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3CECC1A4" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="160" w:after="160"/>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="202020"/>
                </w:rPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:b/>
                    <w:color w:val="202020"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Report of New Information</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="202020"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>: The Report of New Information feature in ETHOS should be used whenever an event occurs within your study that meets prompt reporting requirement (see</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId110">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="202020"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t xml:space="preserve"> </w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId111">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Investigator Manual (HRP-103)</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="202020"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>).</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="61CD8851" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="202020"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Sometimes you may need to complete both types of submissions at the same time as they are related. A good example of this is when a new risk or increased risk has been identified that prompts changes to study materials such as a consent form, protocol, or investigator's brochure.  For submissions that should be reviewed in tandem, make sure to link the Report of New Information to both the main study and accompanying modification. You can also use “Add a Comment” to note that the two submissions are related.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="24F3802B" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2C88A4F3" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041057" w:id="132"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>How do I submit continuing review?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="132"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="112CC204" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>You must submit your Continuing Review no later than 30 days prior to the last day of approval in order for your study to be reviewed and approved for another Continuing Review period. Complete the Continuing Review form in ETHOS and attach all requested supplements, and have the PI submit the form by clicking the “Submit” activity. Before submitting the research for initial review, you must:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7D1BCEB8" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="46"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Determine whether any member of the research staff has a financial interest related to the research. A “yes” or “no” answer is sufficient. There is no need to obtain additional details.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2ED65CAF" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="46"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Obtain the verbal or written agreement of each member of the research staff to his/her role in the research.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="70AE7884" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>If the continuing review involves modifications to previously approved research, submit those modifications either as a combined Modification and Continuing Review or as a separate request for Modification using the Modification form in ETHOS.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="70526313" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>If the continuing review application is not received by the date requested in the approval letter, you will be restricted from submitting new Human Research until the completed application has been received.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="23AFCB50" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>If you are submitting your Continuing Review application within 30 days of the expiration, the IRB Office discourages you from making modifications to your study at that time.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2A1775D5" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">If the approval of Human Research expires because you have failed to submit the Continuing Review application or you submitted the Continuing Review application without enough time for IRB review prior to expiration, all Human Research procedures related to the protocol under review must cease, including recruitment, advertisement, screening, enrollment, consent, interventions, interactions, and collection or analysis of private identifiable information. Continuing Human Research procedures if approval has expired is a violation of university policy. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="611047F1" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>If current subjects will be harmed by stopping Human Research procedures that are available outside the Human Research context, provide these on a clinical basis as needed to protect current subjects. If current subjects will be harmed by stopping Human Research procedures that are not available outside the Human Research context, immediately contact the IRB chair and provide a written list of the currently enrolled subjects and why they will be harmed by stopping Human Research procedures.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="48A4C10A" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>If the IRB reviewed your Continuing Review application, but requires modifications to secure approval, you should submit those modifications in a timely fashion so they can be reviewed before your study transitions to a lapsed state in ETHOS. In cases where the IRB believes a lapse may occur, the IRB will indicate what study procedures may take place during that period. You are responsible for responding to modifications required as soon as possible for the study to transition back to an approved state.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="738E8A53" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">For specific directions on how to submit a Continuing Review application in ETHOS, see </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId112">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000CC"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>How to Submit a Continuing Review in ETHOS</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="3E5D8F5C" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="265183FB" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041058" w:id="133"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What should be reported promptly to the University of Minnesota IRB?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="133"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2040F992" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:rFonts w:ascii="Times New Roman" w:hAnsi="Times New Roman" w:eastAsia="Times New Roman" w:cs="Times New Roman"/>
                    <w:b w:val="false"/>
                    <w:i w:val="false"/>
                    <w:sz w:val="24"/>
                    <w:szCs w:val="24"/>
                </w:rPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_4iylrwe" w:colFirst="0" w:colLast="0" w:id="134"/>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041059" w:id="135"/>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="134"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:rFonts w:ascii="Times New Roman" w:hAnsi="Times New Roman" w:eastAsia="Times New Roman" w:cs="Times New Roman"/>
                    <w:b w:val="false"/>
                    <w:i w:val="false"/>
                    <w:sz w:val="24"/>
                    <w:szCs w:val="24"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">When the University of Minnesota is serving as the IRB of record for the study, reportable events and new information should be promptly reported (within five business days of learning of the event) to the IRB in ETHOS (See </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="_2eclud0">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:rFonts w:ascii="Times New Roman" w:hAnsi="Times New Roman" w:eastAsia="Times New Roman" w:cs="Times New Roman"/>
                        <w:b w:val="false"/>
                        <w:i w:val="false"/>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:sz w:val="24"/>
                        <w:szCs w:val="24"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>How do I Submit Reportable New Information?</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:rFonts w:ascii="Times New Roman" w:hAnsi="Times New Roman" w:eastAsia="Times New Roman" w:cs="Times New Roman"/>
                    <w:b w:val="false"/>
                    <w:i w:val="false"/>
                    <w:sz w:val="24"/>
                    <w:szCs w:val="24"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>). These include, but are not limited to, Unanticipated Problems Involving Risks to Subjects or Others (UPIRTSO).</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="135"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:rFonts w:ascii="Times New Roman" w:hAnsi="Times New Roman" w:eastAsia="Times New Roman" w:cs="Times New Roman"/>
                    <w:b w:val="false"/>
                    <w:i w:val="false"/>
                    <w:sz w:val="24"/>
                    <w:szCs w:val="24"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00B12638" w14:paraId="77B31128" w14:textId="77777777"/>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2BA6116F" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:line="345" w:lineRule="auto"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Unanticipated Problems Involving Risks to Subjects or Others Assessment Criteria (all must be true):</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1CF7AA5D" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="68"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:line="331" w:lineRule="auto"/>
                <w:contextualSpacing/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Is unexpected (in terms of nature, severity, or frequency) given (a) the procedures described in the research protocol documents (e.g., the IRB-approved research protocol and informed consent document) and (b) the characteristics of the human subject population being studied.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="644F7FDC" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="68"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:line="331" w:lineRule="auto"/>
                <w:contextualSpacing/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Is related or possibly related to participation in the research (in this Instruction, possibly related means there is a reasonable possibility that the incident, experience, or outcome may have been caused by the procedures involved in the research).</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="58E8FF1A" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="68"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:line="331" w:lineRule="auto"/>
                <w:contextualSpacing/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Suggests that the research places human subjects or others at a greater risk of harm (including physical, psychological, economic, or social harm) than was previously known or recognized.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00B12638" w14:paraId="7D8F5CA9" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:ind w:left="360"/>
            </w:pPr>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7FE2C5E3" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">It is the responsibility of investigators and research staff to follow the written protocol approved by the IRB. When investigators and/or research staff do not follow the written protocol it may require reporting to the IRB if it meets one or more of the categories below: </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="39CE9777" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:ind w:left="990" w:hanging="270"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">1) Violations that harmed participants/subjects or others or that indicate increased risk of harm; </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="45958FC4" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:ind w:left="720"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>2) Deviations committed to eliminate an immediate hazard for a participant/subject; or</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="15B91C63" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:ind w:left="990" w:hanging="270"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">3) Researcher failure (due to the action or inaction of the investigator or research staff) to follow the protocol. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7982AEB2" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="48"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:contextualSpacing/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">The IRB requires reporting researcher failure whether or not the deviation from the protocol </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:highlight w:val="white"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>affects the scientific soundness of the research plan or the rights, safety, or welfare of human subjects.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00B12638" w14:paraId="2574CD5D" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:rFonts w:ascii="Arial" w:hAnsi="Arial" w:eastAsia="Arial" w:cs="Arial"/>
                    <w:color w:val="FF0000"/>
                    <w:highlight w:val="white"/>
                </w:rPr>
            </w:pPr>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="0CF73571" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Deviations from the protocol that an investigator and research staff involved in the conduct of the research are able to identify before they occur, but cannot prevent from occurring do not require reporting to the IRB. An example is a research participant who is on a business trip and calls the investigator to announce that she is stuck in snow storm and cannot be at a study visit scheduled for the next day. The investigator knows, in advance, that the deviation will occur but it is not under the investigator or research team’s control to avoid.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="02C9DC90" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_2y3w247" w:colFirst="0" w:colLast="0" w:id="136"/>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041060" w:id="137"/>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="136"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:b w:val="false"/>
                    <w:sz w:val="24"/>
                    <w:szCs w:val="24"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Promptly reportable events include:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="137"/>
            <w:r>

                    <w:b w:val="false"/>

                    <w:szCs w:val="24"/>

            </w:r>

            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="000000"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Unexpected Death: Unexpected death of a locally enrolled participant/subject who has not withdrawn from the research whether the death is considered related to the research or not. Death is considered unexpected if the risk of death is not listed in the consent form or is not listed as a possible event in protocol-related documents such as the IRB approved protocol or the Investigator’s Brochure.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>

                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="000000"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>New information (e.g., an interim analysis, safety monitoring report, publication in the literature, sponsor summary report, or investigator finding) indicates an increase in the frequency or magnitude of a previously known risk, or uncovers a new risk. Do not submit Investigational New Drug (IND) safety letters, Medwatch reports, or other such individual reports to the IRB unless, in the opinion of the investigator, the event or information in the report constitutes a UPIRTSO or the report requires a change to the protocol and/or the consent form.</w:t>
            </w:r>

                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="000000"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Incarceration: Incarceration of a subject in a study not approved by the IRB to involve prisoners.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5CBB253A" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="43"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:pBdr>
                    <w:top w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:left w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:bottom w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:right w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:between w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                </w:pBdr>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="000000"/>
                </w:rPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="000000"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Complaint: Unresolved subject complaint.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="128FFF95" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="43"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:pBdr>
                    <w:top w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:left w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:bottom w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:right w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:between w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                </w:pBdr>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="000000"/>
                </w:rPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="000000"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Suspension: Suspension or premature termination by the sponsor, investigator, institution or other IRB.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="394CC4FB" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="43"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:pBdr>
                    <w:top w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:left w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:bottom w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:right w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:between w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                </w:pBdr>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="000000"/>
                </w:rPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="000000"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Unanticipated adverse device effect: Any serious adverse effect on health or safety or any life-threatening problem or death caused by, or associated with, a device, if that effect, problem, or death was not previously identified in nature, severity, or degree of incidence in the investigational plan or application (including a supplementary plan or application), or any other unanticipated serious problem associated with a device that relates to the rights, safety, or welfare of subjects.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="512DA075" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="43"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:pBdr>
                    <w:top w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:left w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:bottom w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:right w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:between w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                </w:pBdr>
                <w:spacing w:after="200"/>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="000000"/>
                </w:rPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="000000"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Disqualification / Termination: Change in qualification of any member of the study team based on state medical board, hospital medical staff action, or other disqualification by professional board or employer.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5E718916" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pBdr>
                    <w:top w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>

                <w:rPr>
                    <w:color w:val="000000"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Information that is not listed above does not require reporting to the University of Minnesota IRB.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidRPr="00B55462" w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00B12638" w14:paraId="44A4F000" w14:textId="77777777">

            <w:pPr>
                <w:pBdr>
                    <w:top w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>
                    <w:left w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>

                </w:pBdr>

            <w:r w:rsidRPr="00B55462">
                <w:t>Investigators are required to assess whether reports from study sponsors meet prompt reporting requirements.   Reports submitted by study sponsors directly to the IRB will be returned with a request to the sponsor to ensure forwarding to the local study investigator.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>

                <w:pBdr>
                    <w:top w:val="none" w:color="000000" w:sz="0" w:space="0"/>

                </w:pBdr>
