            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041081" w:id="159"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What are my roles and responsibilities when relying on an External IRB?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="159"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="60F5CF15" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">Regardless of which IRB is responsible for the IRB review and oversight of your project, the University of Minnesota retains responsibility for the protection of human subjects and for compliance with applicable laws, regulations and ethical standards. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5116329E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">You remain responsible for compliance with all applicable federal regulations, all applicable state and local laws as well as University of Minnesota institutional requirements and policies for and relating to the research. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5BA0B701" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">The Reliance Agreement for your project details the roles and responsibilities of the relying institution, including the Principal Investigator.  You are responsible for following the roles and responsibilities laid out in that Agreement and any associated SOPs as well as information shared with you by the external IRB (or coordinating center) such as the external IRB policies and procedures. This includes, submitting any monitoring reports to the University’s Post Approval Review Program (See </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId127">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>PAR webpage on Investigator Performance</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> for instructions).</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3F9998E0" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>You may not start Human Research activities until you have IRB approval from the external IRB.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="028A985A" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1A037968" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:r>
                <w:br w:type="page"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="125553EB" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading1"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041082" w:id="160"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Conducting Research with External Institutions and External Collaborators</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="160"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="6E810D46" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041083" w:id="161"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What is an “external institution” or “external collaborator”?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="161"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="67E72B64" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">Your research may involve multi-site or collaborative research with external institutions/collaborators. An </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>External Institution</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> or </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>External Collaborator</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> are individuals from outside institutions that are involved in your research (generally individuals who are involved in the design, conduct, or reporting of the research). External institutions are defined as any institution other than the University of Minnesota, Fairview Health Services, or Gillette Children's Specialty Healthcare. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2A788A00" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">See “SOP: Definitions (HRP-001)” for definitions of </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>External Institution</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> and </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:u w:val="single"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>External Collaborator</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="6D52E057" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1F75483E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041084" w:id="162"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>In what cases will the University of Minnesota IRB consider serving as the IRB of record for an external institution or external collaborator engaged in Human Research who does not have an appointment with the University of Minnesota, Fairview, or Gillette/</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="162"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="716135E2" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The University of Minnesota may, on a case-by-case basis, consider serving as the IRB of record for external collaborating independent investigator or institutional investigator (“individual investigators”) engaged in non-exempt U of M research. U of M may be willing to cover an individual investigator if:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="395D0441" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="64"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The individual investigator is not the direct awardee of a grant, contract or cooperative agreement from a federal agency;</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="407913D8" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="64"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">The individual investigator is not affiliated with an institution; or </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7FFB2453" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="64"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The individual investigator is not affiliated with an institution that:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="60AD82B4" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="64"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Has its own IRB or designated IRB (e.g., a hospital or academic institution); and</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7B7C2BA6" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="64"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Has its own federalwide assurance (“FWA”); and</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="65A36D99" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="64"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Is routinely engaged in human research.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="49B06ECF" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">If the U of M IRB does not consider the individual investigator to be engaged in research, the study submission only needs to include a description of that individual investigator’s involvement and a letter of support, if applicable, as supporting documentation in ETHOS. Do not include them as study team members in ETHOS. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1097C814" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Determining whether an external site or external personnel are engaged in research can be difficult and study teams are encouraged to consult with IRB office for guidance.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="29E368AE" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1433A4A5" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041085" w:id="163"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What is required for the University of Minnesota to serve as the IRB of record for an individual investigator who is an external collaborator?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="163"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1C4001B8" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">Requests for the U of M IRB to serve as the IRB for an individual investigator must be submitted to HRPP for review and approval. Requests and questions should be directed to </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId128">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>relyirb@umn.edu</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5E8EB706" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">Requirements for covering an individual investigator include an individual investigator agreement (“IIA”) and completion of human subjects training. HRPP will work with study teams to facilitate an IIA. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="24105073" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="73"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>If the U of M has agreed to enter into an IIA with an individual investigator that is affiliated with an institution, upload a copy of the executed IIA as supporting documentation in ETHOS along with a letter of support from that organization. This external collaborator should be listed as a study team member in ETHOS.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="20EB1B81" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="73"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>If the U of M has agreed to enter into an IIA with an individual investigator that is not affiliated with an institution (e.g., an independent consultant, upload a copy of the executed IIA as a supporting document in ETHOS. This external collaborator should be listed as a study team member in ETHOS. If they do not need access to ETHOS and there is an IIA agreement in place, complete the “External Team Member Information Form (</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId129">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="1155CC"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>HRP-216</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>)” and upload it under “External Team Members.”</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="768AE187" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">Reminder: The University of Minnesota IRB will not serve as the IRB of record for multi-site research studies. This means that other </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:b/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">institutions/sites </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>(e.g., academic institution or hospital)</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:b/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>cannot rely on the University’s IRB for IRB review at this time.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="48FAE4B0" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5C241C76" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041086" w:id="164"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Should I list an external institution in the ETHOS submission?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="164"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7064C39D" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">Every institution engaged in Human Subjects Research must receive IRB review and approval. Because the U of M is not currently agreeing to serve as IRB of record for external institutions affiliated with an IRB, review for that site must be obtained from that external institution’s IRB or an IRB the institution has agreed to rely on for IRB review. See "WORKSHEET: Engagement Determination (HRP-311)" for additional guidance on engagement in research. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="64B15BB0" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="26"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:b/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">If the External Site (e.g., university, hospital) is engaged in human subjects research: </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">Your protocol should include information regarding external sites/collaborators. Do not include external personnel as study team members in ETHOS. The external collaborator(s) from the external institution must ask their own IRB to review their involvement in the project or study.  The UMN IRB may request verification of external site IRB approval during review of your protocol. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="0317604F" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="26"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:b/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>If the External Site (e.g., university, hospital) is not engaged in human subjects research:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:b/>
                    <w:i/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">If the U of M IRB does not consider external site(s) engaged in research, the study submission only needs to include a description of that site's involvement. Do not include external personnel as study team members in ETHOS. </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="32D6635C" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="26"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>If the external personnel are affiliated with an institution (e.g., university, hospital) with its own IRB, they should consult with their own IRB office to determine if any additional action is needed.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="65AE7DCA" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="721C9628" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:pStyle w:val="Heading2"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:br w:type="page"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="4DB96C53" w14:textId="77777777">

            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041089" w:id="167"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What if I have questions about the IRB process or IRB review?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="167"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1AD440F0" w14:textId="77777777">

            </w:pPr>

            </w:r>

            </w:pPr>
            <w:bookmarkStart w:name="_Toc518041090" w:id="168"/>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>What if I have concerns about the IRB process or IRB review?</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:bookmarkEnd w:id="168"/>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1DF701FA" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="120" w:after="120"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">If you have questions, concerns, complaints, allegations of undue influence, allegations or findings of non-compliance, or input regarding the Human Research Protection Program you many contact the HRPP, anonymously if desired, through the </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId131">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>online feedback form</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve"> or by phone. Information about reporting concerns is available at </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId132">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>http://www.irb.umn.edu/report.html</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>

            </w:pPr>

                <w:jc w:val="both"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:br w:type="page"/>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:rFonts w:ascii="Arial" w:hAnsi="Arial" w:eastAsia="Arial" w:cs="Arial"/>
                    <w:b/>
                    <w:sz w:val="32"/>
                    <w:szCs w:val="32"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Additional Requirements for DHHS-Regulated Research</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:rFonts w:ascii="Arial" w:hAnsi="Arial" w:eastAsia="Arial" w:cs="Arial"/>
                    <w:b/>
                    <w:sz w:val="32"/>
                    <w:szCs w:val="32"/>
                    <w:vertAlign w:val="superscript"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:footnoteReference w:id="2"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="12D581BA" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="36"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>When a subject decides to withdraw from a clinical trial, the investigator conducting the clinical trial should ask the subject to clarify whether the subject wishes to withdraw from all components of the trial or only from the primary interventional component of the trial. If the latter, research activities involving other components of the clinical trial, such as follow-up data collection activities, for which the subject previously gave consent may continue. The investigator should explain to the subject who wishes to withdraw the importance of obtaining follow-up safety data about the subject.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="23DE88D9" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="36"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Investigators are allowed to retain and analyze already collected data relating to any subject who chooses to withdraw from a research study or whose participation is terminated by an investigator without regard to the subject’s consent, provided such analysis falls within the scope of the analysis described in the IRB-approved protocol. This is the case even if that data includes identifiable private information about the subject.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2B34C33A" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="36"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>For research not subject to regulation and review by FDA, investigators, in consultation with the funding agency, can choose to honor a research subject’s request that the investigator destroy the subject’s data or that the investigator exclude the subject’s data from any analysis.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="22324C1B" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="36"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>When seeking the informed consent of subjects, investigators should explain whether already collected data about the subjects will be retained and analyzed even if the subjects choose to withdraw from the research.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00B12638" w14:paraId="7E9E7EF2" w14:textId="77777777"/>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="217913A2" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3CF3024C" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:keepNext/>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="17"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="240" w:after="60"/>
                <w:ind w:left="720"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:br w:type="page"/>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:rFonts w:ascii="Arial" w:hAnsi="Arial" w:eastAsia="Arial" w:cs="Arial"/>
                    <w:b/>
                    <w:sz w:val="32"/>
                    <w:szCs w:val="32"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t>Additional Requirements for FDA-Regulated Research</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="51ABEC49" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>When a subject withdraws from a study:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:vertAlign w:val="superscript"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:footnoteReference w:id="3"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="4B947BB8" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The data collected on the subject to the point of withdrawal remains part of the study database and may not be removed.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1A5B1B76" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>An investigator may ask a subject who is withdrawing whether the subject wishes to provide continued follow-up and further data collection subsequent to their withdrawal from the interventional portion of the study. Under this circumstance, the discussion with the subject would distinguish between study-related interventions and continued follow-up of associated clinical outcome information, such as medical course or laboratory results obtained through non-invasive chart review, and address the maintenance of privacy and confidentiality of the subject’s information.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="34393AA3" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>If a subject withdraws from the interventional portion of the study, but agrees to continued follow-up of associated clinical outcome information as described in the previous bullet, the investigator must obtain the subject’s informed consent for this limited participation in the study (assuming such a situation was not described in the original informed consent form). IRB approval of informed consent documents is required.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="128B3E9B" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>If a subject withdraws from the interventional portion of a study and does not consent to continued follow-up of associated clinical outcome information, the investigator must not access for purposes related to the study the subject’s medical record or other confidential records requiring the subject’s consent.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="02ED8D6A" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>An investigator may review study data related to the subject collected prior to the subject’s withdrawal from the study, and may consult public records, such as those establishing survival status.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="6E56CB76" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>For FDA-regulated research involving investigational drugs:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="12C8514D" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Investigators must abide by FDA restrictions on promotion of investigational drugs:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:vertAlign w:val="superscript"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:footnoteReference w:id="4"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="29E3C2E0" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>An investigator, or any person acting on behalf of an investigator, must not represent in a promotional context that an investigational new drug is safe or effective for the purposes for which it is under investigation or otherwise promote the drug.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="21B7E54B" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>This provision is not intended to restrict the full exchange of scientific information concerning the drug, including dissemination of scientific findings in scientific or lay media. Rather, its intent is to restrict promotional claims of safety or effectiveness of the drug for a use for which it is under investigation and to preclude commercialization of the drug before it is approved for commercial distribution.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="26E42086" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>An investigator must not commercially distribute or test market an investigational new drug.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="18C089F3" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Follow FDA requirements for general responsibilities of investigators</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:vertAlign w:val="superscript"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:footnoteReference w:id="5"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2D78FDE1" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>An investigator is responsible for ensuring that an investigation is conducted according to the signed investigator statement, the investigational plan, and applicable regulations; for protecting the rights, safety, and welfare of subjects under the investigator's care; and for the control of drugs under investigation.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="15B068F9" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>An investigator must, in accordance with the provisions of 21 CFR §50, obtain the informed consent of each human subject to whom the drug is administered, except as provided in 21 CFR §50.23 or §50.24 of this chapter.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2BB7CFD5" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Additional specific responsibilities of clinical investigators are set forth in this part and in 21 CFR §50 and 21 CFR §56.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="45ACDAC5" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Follow FDA requirements for control of the investigational drug</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:vertAlign w:val="superscript"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:footnoteReference w:id="6"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1351A0D8" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>An investigator must administer the drug only to subjects under the investigator's personal supervision or under the supervision of a sub-investigator responsible to the investigator.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3D9439D0" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The investigator must not supply the investigational drug to any person not authorized under this part to receive it.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7A7AB501" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Follow FDA requirements for investigator recordkeeping and record retention</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:vertAlign w:val="superscript"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:footnoteReference w:id="7"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="507EDC67" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Disposition of drug:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2DDA2AC5" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>An investigator is required to maintain adequate records of the disposition of the drug, including dates, quantity, and use by subjects.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="25A788C2" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>If the investigation is terminated, suspended, discontinued, or completed, the investigator must return the unused supplies of the drug to the sponsor, or otherwise provide for disposition of the unused supplies of the drug under 21 CFR §312.59.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="27362F01" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Case histories.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="64B5F980" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>An investigator is required to prepare and maintain adequate and accurate case histories that record all observations and other data pertinent to the investigation on each individual administered the investigational drug or employed as a control in the investigation.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="34318FEC" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Case histories include the case report forms and supporting data including, for example, signed and dated consent forms and medical records including, for example, progress notes of the physician, the individual's hospital charts, and the nurses' notes. The case history for each individual must document that informed consent was obtained prior to participation in the study.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="6C6B2434" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Record retention: An investigator must retain required records for a period of 2 years following the date a marketing application is approved for the drug for the indication for which it is being investigated; or, if no application is to be filed or if the application is not approved for such indication, until 2 years after the investigation is discontinued and FDA is notified.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="6558C611" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Follow FDA requirements for investigator reports</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:vertAlign w:val="superscript"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:footnoteReference w:id="8"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="19B358AA" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Progress reports: The investigator must furnish all reports to the sponsor of the drug who is responsible for collecting and evaluating the results obtained.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="105D271C" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Safety reports: An investigator must promptly report to the sponsor any adverse effect that may reasonably be regarded as caused by, or probably caused by, the drug. If the adverse effect is alarming, the investigator must report the adverse effect immediately.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="60B21D3C" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Final report: An investigator must provide the sponsor with an adequate report shortly after completion of the investigator's participation in the investigation.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="2C186C40" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Financial disclosure reports:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3FFDAAD7" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The clinical investigator must provide the sponsor with sufficient accurate financial information to allow an applicant to submit complete and accurate certification or disclosure statements as required under 21 CFR §54.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="018FE0E9" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The clinical investigator must promptly update this information if any relevant changes occur during the course of the investigation and for 1 year following the completion of the study.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="07B40637" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Follow FDA requirements for assurance of IRB review</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:vertAlign w:val="superscript"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:footnoteReference w:id="9"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="205F2EF8" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>An investigator must assure that an IRB that complies with the requirements set forth in 21 CFR §56 will be responsible for the initial and continuing review and approval of the proposed clinical study.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7E99ADE7" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The investigator must also assure that he or she will promptly report to the IRB all changes in the research activity and all unanticipated problems involving risk to human subjects or others, and that he or she will not make any changes in the research without IRB approval, except where necessary to eliminate apparent immediate hazards to human subjects.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="68B17C40" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Follow FDA requirements for inspection of investigator's records and reports</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:vertAlign w:val="superscript"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:footnoteReference w:id="10"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7BF8991C" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>An investigator must upon request from any properly authorized officer or employee of FDA, at reasonable times, permit such officer or employee to have access to, and copy and verify any records or reports made by the investigator pursuant to 312.62.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="0B16BCAA" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The investigator is not required to divulge subject names unless the records of particular individuals require a more detailed study of the cases, or unless there is reason to believe that the records do not represent actual case studies, or do not represent actual results obtained.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="0250720B" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Follow FDA requirements for handling of controlled substances</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:vertAlign w:val="superscript"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:footnoteReference w:id="11"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="6333D0E2" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>If the investigational drug is subject to the Controlled Substances Act, the investigator must take adequate precautions, including storage of the investigational drug in a securely locked, substantially constructed cabinet, or other securely locked, substantially constructed enclosure, access to which is limited, to prevent theft or diversion of the substance into illegal channels of distribution.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="55E1537B" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>For FDA-regulated research involving investigational devices:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="404C7D4F" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>General responsibilities of investigators.</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:vertAlign w:val="superscript"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:footnoteReference w:id="12"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5170218E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>An investigator is responsible for ensuring that an investigation is conducted according to the signed agreement, the investigational plan and applicable FDA regulations, for protecting the rights, safety, and welfare of subjects under the investigator's care, and for the control of devices under investigation. An investigator also is responsible for ensuring that informed consent is obtained in accordance with 21 CFR §50.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="55C426F7" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Specific responsibilities of investigators</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:vertAlign w:val="superscript"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:footnoteReference w:id="13"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="6117BE86" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Awaiting approval: An investigator may determine whether potential subjects would be interested in participating in an investigation, but must not request the written informed consent of any subject to participate, and must not allow any subject to participate before obtaining IRB and FDA approval.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="66F510FD" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Compliance: An investigator must conduct an investigation in accordance with the signed agreement with the sponsor, the investigational plan, and other applicable FDA regulations, and any conditions of approval imposed by an IRB or FDA.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="6299B2D8" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Supervising device use: An investigator must permit an investigational device to be used only with subjects under the investigator's supervision. An investigator must not supply an investigational device to any person not authorized to receive it.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3D6EE8C1" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Financial disclosure:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="62E3F73F" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>A clinical investigator must disclose to the sponsor sufficient accurate financial information to allow the applicant to submit complete and accurate certification or disclosure statements required under 21 CFR §54.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5E91227F" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The investigator must promptly update this information if any relevant changes occur during the course of the investigation and for 1 year following completion of the study.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="00E55096" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Disposing of device: Upon completion or termination of a clinical investigation or the investigator's part of an investigation, or at the sponsor's request, an investigator must return to the sponsor any remaining supply of the device or otherwise dispose of the device as the sponsor directs.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="785133ED" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Maintain the following accurate, complete, and current records relating to the investigator's participation in an investigation:</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:vertAlign w:val="superscript"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:footnoteReference w:id="14"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5E41F618" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>All correspondence with another investigator, an IRB, the sponsor, a monitor, or FDA, including required reports.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="238AEAC9" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Records of receipt, use or disposition of a device that relate to:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="235DE25C" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The type and quantity of the device, the dates of its receipt, and the batch number or code mark.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="63C1A5E2" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The names of all persons who received, used, or disposed of each device.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1705AD5D" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Why and how many units of the device have been returned to the sponsor, repaired, or otherwise disposed of.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="4FD88F97" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Records of each subject's case history and exposure to the device. Case histories include the case report forms and supporting data including, for example, signed and dated consent forms and medical records including, for example, progress notes of the physician, the individual's hospital charts, and the nurses' notes. Such records must include:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="420986A5" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Documents evidencing informed consent and, for any use of a device by the investigator without informed consent, any written concurrence of a licensed physician and a brief description of the circumstances justifying the failure to obtain informed consent.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="027F4C46" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Documentation that informed consent was obtained prior to participation in the study.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="689DD538" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>All relevant observations, including records concerning adverse device effects (whether anticipated or unanticipated), information and data on the condition of each subject upon entering, and during the course of, the investigation, including information about relevant previous medical history and the results of all diagnostic tests.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="0A09C39B" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>A record of the exposure of each subject to the investigational device, including the date and time of each use, and any other therapy.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="33A1B7E6" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>The protocol, with documents showing the dates of and reasons for each deviation from the protocol.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5E18BAEF" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Any other records that FDA requires to be maintained by regulation or by specific requirement for a category of investigations or a particular investigation.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="75C84E7E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Inspections</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:vertAlign w:val="superscript"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:footnoteReference w:id="15"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="207838A7" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Entry and inspection: A sponsor or an investigator who has authority to grant access must permit authorized FDA employees, at reasonable times and in a reasonable manner, to enter and inspect any establishment where devices are held (including any establishment where devices are manufactured, processed, packed, installed, used, or implanted or where records of results from use of devices are kept).</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3F222254" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Records inspection: A sponsor, IRB, or investigator, or any other person acting on behalf of such a person with respect to an investigation, must permit authorized FDA employees, at reasonable times and in a reasonable manner, to inspect and copy all records relating to an investigation.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1B8BCB2E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Records identifying subjects: An investigator must permit authorized FDA employees to inspect and copy records that identify subjects, upon notice that FDA has reason to suspect that adequate informed consent was not obtained, or that reports required to be submitted by the investigator to the sponsor or IRB have not been submitted or are incomplete, inaccurate, false, or misleading.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="5CFE754E" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="1"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Prepare and submit the following complete, accurate, and timely reports</w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:vertAlign w:val="superscript"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:footnoteReference w:id="16"/>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="28E72A1F" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Unanticipated adverse device effects. An investigator must submit to the sponsor and to the reviewing IRB a report of any unanticipated adverse device effect occurring during an investigation as soon as possible, but in no event later than 10 working days after the investigator first learns of the effect.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="4747B99C" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Withdrawal of IRB approval. An investigator must report to the sponsor, within 5 working days, a withdrawal of approval by the reviewing IRB of the investigator's part of an investigation.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="25A8610D" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Progress. An investigator must submit progress reports on the investigation to the sponsor, the monitor, and the reviewing IRB at regular intervals, but in no event less often than yearly.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="479FFF39" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Deviations from the investigational plan:</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="600EFCD4" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>An investigator must notify the sponsor and the reviewing IRB of any deviation from the investigational plan to protect the life or physical well-being of a subject in an emergency.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3A064A07" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Such notice must be given as soon as possible, but in no event later than 5 working days after the emergency occurred.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1E52AF6F" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="3"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Except in such an emergency, prior approval by the sponsor is required for changes in or deviations from a plan, and if these changes or deviations may affect the scientific soundness of the plan or the rights, safety, or welfare of human subjects, FDA and IRB also is required.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="6520F456" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Informed consent. If an investigator uses a device without obtaining informed consent, the investigator must report such use to the sponsor and the reviewing IRB within 5 working days after the use occurs.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="3C4A7E3B" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Final report. An investigator must, within 3 months after termination or completion of the investigation or the investigator's part of the investigation, submit a final report to the sponsor and the reviewing IRB.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="10D961FF" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="2"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="11"/>
                </w:numPr>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Other. An investigator must, upon request by a reviewing IRB or FDA, provide accurate, complete, and current information about any aspect of the investigation.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00B12638" w14:paraId="7E912ED4" w14:textId="77777777"/>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="007C04DF" w14:paraId="22BE67E3" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:hyperlink w:anchor="1fob9te">
                <w:r w:rsidR="00124C66">
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="0000FF"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>Return to Table of Contents</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="7DA44674" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:keepNext/>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="17"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:spacing w:before="240" w:after="60"/>
                <w:ind w:left="360"/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:br w:type="page"/>
            </w:r>
            <w:r>
                <w:rPr>
                    <w:rFonts w:ascii="Arial" w:hAnsi="Arial" w:eastAsia="Arial" w:cs="Arial"/>
                    <w:b/>
                    <w:sz w:val="32"/>
                    <w:szCs w:val="32"/>
                </w:rPr>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">Additional Requirements for Clinical Trials (ICH-GCP) </w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="222FCBED" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:r>
                <w:t xml:space="preserve">For the detailed FDA GCP Guidance, See </w:t>
            </w:r>
            <w:hyperlink r:id="rId133">
                <w:r>
                    <w:rPr>
                        <w:color w:val="1155CC"/>
                        <w:u w:val="single"/>
                    </w:rPr>
                    <w:t>E6(R2) Good Clinical Practice: Integrated Addendum to ICH E6(R1) Guidance for Industry</w:t>
                </w:r>
            </w:hyperlink>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>.</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="1EAEF946" w14:textId="77777777">
            <w:pPr>
                <w:numPr>
                    <w:ilvl w:val="0"/>
                    <w:numId w:val="28"/>
                </w:numPr>
                <w:contextualSpacing/>
            </w:pPr>
            <w:r>
                <w:t>Investigator's Qualifications and Agreements</w:t>
            </w:r>
        </w:p>
        <w:p w:rsidR="00B12638" w:rsidRDefault="00124C66" w14:paraId="399DB26B" w14:textId="77777777">
